answers.answer: TR, are you cross-reactive to casein, the major protein in dairy? Many celiacs are and it can result in continued problems.
test your blood vit b 12 vit D anemic diabetes.. add omega fish vit E,.psorisis? ezcema

question: I have celiac desease for at least two years now. The rash presists even after being gluten free for a year or more. Could there be another underlying desease causing the rash on my buttox, elbows, head, fingers, and knees ? I read everything and research everything I put in my body still the nasty rashes presists.What type of specialest should I see. I have seen a good dermotoilest..but no relief.
title: Rash but Gluten Free
